common-links.delegate-access: WELSH -- Delegate access to a financial adviser

card-1.title: WELSH -- Explore the Pensions Dashboard
card-1.description: WELSH -- Don't know where to start? Learn how to get the most out of your Pensions Dashboard and get answers for common questions.

card-2.title: WELSH -- Understand your pensions
card-2.description: WELSH -- Unsure about your next steps? Our free, impartial guidance can help you understand your pensions and plan for a comfortable retirement.

card-3.title: WELSH -- Report a technical problem
card-3.description: WELSH -- sTell us if there's an issue with your Dashboard or if you're experiencing any technical problems.

logout.we-will-redirect: WELSH -- We'll redirect you to MoneyHelper. If you exit the service now, you'll need to sign in again using GOV.UK One Login to view your pensions.
logout.are-you-sure: WELSH -- Are you sure you want to leave?

contact.preferred: WELSH -- Best way to contact your provider with queries

error.title: Mae'n ddrwg gennym ni allem ddod o hyd i'r dudalen rydych yn chwilio amdani
error.intro: WELSH -- We are still building and improving our service. Something went wrong but we will try to fix it.

what-you-can-do.title: Beth allwch chi ei wneud:
items: WELSH -- Click the Back button in your browser to check if you’re in the right place.
WELSH -- [Report a technical problem.](/cy/support/report-a-technical-problem)

start.hero-text: WELSH -- See all your pensions in one place with our free and secure government-backed service.

section-you-can.title: WELSH -- You can :
items: WELSH -- View all your pensions together - including workplace pensions, personal pensions, your State Pension and any you might have lost.
WELSH -- See how much you could get when you retire.

section-how-it-works.title: WELSH -- How it works
items: WELSH -- Prove your identity using **GOV.UK One Login**. You can set one up as part of this tool.
WELSH -- Enter your **National Insurance number**, if you know it. You can still proceed without one
WELSH -- See all the pensions that match your details, including your estimated income when you retire.
WELSH -- Log back in any time to view your pensions dashboard and latest figures.

section-you-need.title: WELSH -- You'll need
items: WELSH -- a mobile phone
WELSH -- your National Insurance number
WELSH -- photo ID, if it's your first time using GOV.UK One Login

welcome.title: WELSH -- Welcome to the MoneyHelper Pensions Dashboard
welcome.heading: WELSH -- Important information
welcome.intro: WELSH -- Do not make financial decisions based solely on the information in your Pensions Dashboard.
welcome.content: WELSH -- The values are for illustration only and are based on some assumptions, such as your retirement age. Always check with your pension providers for the most up-to-date information, and consider speaking to a regulated financial adviser before making decisions about your pensions.

values.title: WELSH -- All pension values are :
items: WELSH -- shown before tax
WELSH -- estimated and not guaranteed
WELSH -- subject to change based on factors such as investment performance and your contributions

excluded.title: WELSH -- Some pensions may not be included :
items: WELSH -- You will not see any pensions that you're already getting money from.
WELSH -- Providers can choose whether to send us some data on new or small pensions.

searching-for-your-pension.title: WELSH -- Searching for your pensions
searching-for-your-pension.description:
WELSH -- This typically takes {duration} seconds. Thank you for your patience. 

We're searching 3000 pension schemes and providers for your pensions.
searching-for-your-pension.refresh: WELSH -- Do not refresh or close the page.

carousel.heading: WELSH -- Did you know?
carousel.not-matched: WELSH -- There are an estimated 2.8 million pension pots not currently matched to their owner.
carousel.not-matched-alt: WELSH -- Logo of a piggy bank
carousel.dashboard: WELSH -- Not all pension options are listed here. Please get in touch with your specific schemes and providers for more details.
carousel.dashboard-alt: WELSH -- Logo of a dashboard screen
carousel.schemes: WELSH -- Not all pension options are listed here. Please get in touch with your specific schemes and providers for more details.
carousel.schemes-alt: WELSH -- Logo of three arrows fanning out

your-pension-breakdown.title: WELSH -- Your pensions
your-pension-breakdown.heading: WELSH -- Pension breakdown
your-pension-breakdown.description: WELSH -- Your breakdown only includes pensions that have been matched to your personal details.

callout.heading: WELSH -- Your summary
callout.description: WELSH -- When you are **{age}** years old, your total estimated retirement income could be **{monthlyTotal}** a month or **{annualTotal}** a year.

items: WELSH -- Your Pensions Dashboard contains sensitive and valuable information. Think carefully before sharing your information with a third party.
WELSH -- Scammers play on our sense of fear. If you've been contacted without warning and told you need to move your pensions to a safe place, this is a scam.

action.heading: WELSH -- If you're worried about scams, you can:
items: WELSH -- Read our guidance on [spotting pension scams](https://www.moneyhelper.org.uk/cy/money-troubles/scams/how-to-spot-a-pension-scam)
WELSH -- Call our financial crimes and scams unit on [0800 015 4402](tel:08000154402)

pension-details.title: WELSH -- {name} summary
pension-details.description: WELSH -- You can take your **{name}** on **{date}** when you are **{age}** years old. Your forecast is **{monthly}** a month or **{yearly}** a year.

more-info.cost: WELSH -- For more information about costs and charges, go to
more-info.sp: WELSH -- For more information about your State Pension, go to

pending-pensions.title: WELSH -- Pending pensions
pending-pensions.description:
WELSH -- These pensions are waiting for more information from your pension providers. You do not need to take action. 

They'll automatically show up on your pension breakdown once their information is complete.

pensions-that-need-action.title: WELSH -- Pensions that need action
pensions-that-need-action.description: WELSH -- These pensions only match some of your details. We need more information to confirm they belong to you.

card.description: WELSH -- Contact {pensionAdministrator} and give them your reference number. They'll ask for your details and confirm whether this pension belongs to you. If confirmed, it will show up in your pensions breakdown.

scam-warning.heading: WELSH -- Be aware of scams
scam-warning.description: WELSH -- A pension provider will **never contact you first** to ask for your personal information about a pension they say might belong to you. You must contact the pension provider with your reference number to confirm if a pension is yours.

incomplete.title: WELSH -- Pensions waiting for more information from your pension providers

unconfirmed.title: WELSH -- Pensions that need you to contact your pension provider
unconfirmed.sub-title: WELSH -- Action needed to confirm if these pensions belong to you or for some other reason.
unconfirmed.cta: WELSH -- Review pensions that need action

common-links.pensions-not-showing: WELSH -- Is one or more of your pensions not showing?

no-pensions-found.title: WELSH -- No pensions found
no-pensions-found.heading: WELSH -- What you can do
no-pensions-found.tooltip: WELSH -- We are still building and improving our service. We are connecting new pension schemes on a regularly basis.
items: WELSH -- You can check back at a later time to see if your pensions are showing.
WELSH -- If you didn't provide your National Insurance number, [go back and enter it.](/cy/)

WELSH -- If your State Pension is not showing and you think you're entitled to one, [check your details using your State Pension forecast (opens in a new tab).](https://www.gov.uk/check-state-pension)
WELSH -- If you know the name of your employer(s) or pension provider(s), you can contact them directly.
WELSH -- If you still cannot see your pensions, see our Help and Support below.

pensions-not-showing.title: WELSH -- Pensions not showing
pensions-not-showing.intro: WELSH -- We're still building and improving our service. We're connecting new pension schemes on a regular basis.
pensions-not-showing.paragraph-1: WELSH -- If any of your pensions are missing from the Dashboard, let us know. You can also check back at a later time to see if your pensions are showing.
pensions-not-showing.paragraph-2: WELSH -- Thanks for helping improve the Money Helper Pensions Dashboard.

complaints.title: WELSH -- Complaints
complaints.content:
WELSH -- A page to register a complaint. 

New Paragraph. Example markdown with *italic*, **bold**, and an external link to [a website](http://foo.bar)

download-data.title: WELSH -- Download Data
download-data.content: WELSH -- A page to download data

manage-consent.title: WELSH -- Manage Consent
manage-consent.content: WELSH -- A page to manage consent

callout.title: WELSH -- Not what you're looking for?
callout.content: WELSH -- If you can't find the answer you were looking for try our other guides or get in touch

suggest-another-question.title: WELSH -- Suggest another question
suggest-another-question.intro: WELSH -- We are still building and improving our service. We may not show everything you might expect. Let us know what we're missing.
suggest-another-question.content: WELSH -- Do you have a question that you think we should include in the Frequently Asked Questions? Please tell us below.
suggest-another-question.thanks: WELSH -- Thanks for helping improve the Money Helper Pensions Dashboard.

explore-the-pensions-dashboard.title: WELSH -- Explore the pensions dashboard
explore-the-pensions-dashboard.heading: WELSH -- General questions
explore-the-pensions-dashboard.description: WELSH -- Get support for common questions about the pension dashboard.

understand-your-pensions.title: WELSH -- Understand your pensions
understand-your-pensions.heading: WELSH -- General questions
understand-your-pensions.description: WELSH -- Get support for common questions about pensions.

further-guidance.title: WELSH -- Further guidance
further-guidance.description: WELSH -- Whether you're just starting to think about pensions or you're about to retire, MoneyHelper has guidance to help you plan.

report-a-technical-problem.title: WELSH -- Report a technical problem
report-a-technical-problem.intro: WELSH -- We are still building and improving our service. Please tell us what technical issue you are experiencing in as much detail as possible.
report-a-technical-problem.content: WELSH -- Please include the type of device you're on and what browser you're using (if you know it).
report-a-technical-problem.thanks: WELSH -- Thanks for helping improve the Money Helper Pensions Dashboard.

form.title: WELSH -- Report a technical problem form
